DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind randomized control trial compare shorter interval administration mifepristone misoprostol ( simultaneous administration compare 24hours administration mifepristone receipt first dose misoprostol ) termination pregnancy 13-22 week gestation . The investigator hypothesize shorten interval may achieve comparable efficacy terminate pregnancy , whilst reduce duration procedure turn , duration hospitalization .
DOC.brief_title: Medical Abortion With Mifepristone + Misoprostol ( 13 - 22 Weeks )
DOC.criteria: Closed cervical o vaginal bleeding Live fetus time presentation service No contraindication medical abortion study procedure , accord provider Able consent participate study , either read consent document consent document read sign informed consent Willing follow study procedure Known previous transmural uterine incision > 5 parity Signs symptom infection Any contraindication vaginal delivery , include placenta previa Presentation active labor ( defined moderate severe contraction every 10 minute less )
